video.title: The Seven Deadly Sins
video.synopsis: When a kingdom is taken over by tyrants, the deposed princess begins a quest to find a disbanded group of evil knights to help take back her realm.

episodes.synopsis: A princess finds a former knight at a pub and joins a quest to reunite his group of cavaliers in order to overthrow tyrants and restore the kingdom.
episodes.title: The Seven Deadly Sins

episodes.synopsis: When Gilthunder plants his sword in the center of the town and stops the village from making ale, only Meliodas can remove it, making him town savior.
episodes.title: The Sword of the Holy Knight

episodes.synopsis: Meliodas, Hawk and Elizabeth travel to the daunting Forest of White Dreams, where Meliodas goes to dangerous extremes to obtain information.
episodes.title: The Sin in the Sleeping Forest

episodes.synopsis: Diane joins the mission to free Ban from the Baste Dungeon, but the group is assailed by an enemy set on crushing the whole town and the Deadly Sins.
episodes.title: A Little Girl's Dream

episodes.synopsis: Golgius tries to seize the sword from Elizabeth and Meliodas; the sound of a mysterious bell drives the group to fight each other.
episodes.title: Even if You Should Die

episodes.synopsis: Elizabeth and Meliodas must fight Holy Knights Friesia and Ruin to proceed to the dungeon. An omen foretells of disaster on its way to Britannia.
episodes.title: The Poem of Beginnings

episodes.synopsis: Ban, Meliodas and company have finally reunited. Seeking a clue to the location of the Grizzly's Sin of Sloth, they head to the Capital of the Dead.
episodes.title: A Touching Reunion

episodes.synopsis: King and Ban have a final showdown; Holy Knight Guila battles Meliodas, Diane and Elizabeth; Ban remembers Elaine and the Fountain of Youth.
episodes.title: The Fearsome Pursuer

episodes.synopsis: Elaine finally persuades King to rescue Meliodas and the others. Back in the capital, malcontent starts to stir among some of the Holy Knights.
episodes.title: Dark Pulse

episodes.synopsis: Upon learning the fighting festival's grand prize, Gideon, Meliodas, Ban and King decide to participate, as do Holy Knights Howzer and Griamore.
episodes.title: The Vaizel Fighting Festival

episodes.synopsis: In the final match of the festival's first round, Ban reflects on the first time he met Meliodas. Veronica and Griamore search for Elizabeth.
episodes.title: Pent-up Feelings

episodes.synopsis: During the last match of the festival, the venue breaks out in pandemonium when a group of Holy Knights attacks. What have they come for?
episodes.title: Bloodcurdling Canon

episodes.synopsis: Enclosed inside the Goddess Amber, Meliodas breaks free and reappears. Not his true self, he begins attacking his allies as well as his enemies.
episodes.title: The Angel of Destruction

episodes.synopsis: Meliodas and his pals begin a new search for the remaining Seven Deadly Sins. The Holy Knight Helbram dispatches assassins to crush the Armor Giant.
episodes.title: A Reader of Books

episodes.synopsis: Just as the attack overtakes the Armor Giant, Gowther appears, taking unexpected action. Elizabeth learns of Meliodas's past and the existence of Liz.
episodes.title: Unholy Knight

episodes.synopsis: Elizabeth's words convince Meliodas to fight, and it becomes clear who stole his consciousness. Hendrickson begins to resurrect the Demon Clan.
episodes.title: The Legends, Provoked

episodes.synopsis: When Elizabeth is kidnapped, Meliodas, Ban and Gowther launch an attack on the capital. Meanwhile, King Arthur of Camelot confronts Hendrickson.
episodes.title: The First Sacrifice

episodes.synopsis: Diane has a brush with death while protecting Zeal. Howzer and Guila are forced into a struggle against formidable magical powers.
episodes.title: Even If It Costs Me My Life

episodes.synopsis: King recalls how he met Diane 700 years ago and the sad event that occurred between him and Helbram. What promise did these once good friends make?
episodes.title: The Fairy King Waits In Vain

episodes.synopsis: In order to take Elizabeth back, Meliodas teams up with Arthur to fight a fierce battle against Hendrickson and Gilthunder.
episodes.title: The Courage Charm

episodes.synopsis: Merlin's appearance crushes Vivian's ambitions, and Meliodas is reunited with Elizabeth. Ban learns he must kill someone in order to resurrect Elaine.
episodes.title: The Looming Threat

episodes.synopsis: Meliodas loses Elizabeth again. Ban confronts the person he must kill in order to save Elaine. Diane and company battle against the New Generation.
episodes.title: What I Can Do For You

episodes.synopsis: Pursued by the Seven Deadly Sins, Hendrickson makes two finds that give him the ultimate Demon power.
episodes.title: Despair Descends

episodes.synopsis: Just when it seems as if the Seven Deadly Sins will be defeated by Hendrickson's overwhelming power, Elizabeth's power returns to her.
episodes.title: The Heroes

episodes.synopsis: With the capital retaken and the Liones Kingdom slowly getting back on its feet, Meliodas, Elizabeth and Hawk turn their attention to the Boar Hat.
episodes.title: The Dark Dream Begins

episodes.synopsis: Ban and Meliodas meet to continue the duel they left unfinished before, only to find that Hawk has told everyone about their solemn battle.
episodes.title: Our Fighting Festival

episodes.synopsis: King is overjoyed to spend the day of the festival with Diane, but he's struggling to figure out how to take the next step.
episodes.title: In Pursuit of First Love

episodes.synopsis: Business at the Boar Hat is dropping, so Meliodas asks Merlin to join the staff as a waitress alongside Elizabeth and Diane to attract customers.
episodes.title: The Shape of Love

episodes.synopsis: As the kingdom begins to rebuild after the coup attempt, the king honors the Seven Deadly Sins for their bravery with a medal ceremony.
episodes.title: Revival of the Demon Clan

episodes.synopsis: With Fraudrin's manipulation of Hendrickson, the Ten Commandments return to the physical realm. King follows Ban to the Fairy King's Forest.
episodes.title: Existence & Proof

episodes.synopsis: Diane confronts Gowther after he manipulates Guila and Zeal's memories. With the return of the Demon Clan, new threats descend upon allied clans.
episodes.title: The Sacred Treasure Lostvayne

episodes.synopsis: King struggles to fend off the giant Albion sent to destroy the Fairy King's Forest. Galand of the Ten Commandments appears before Meliodas.
episodes.title: The Ten Commandments on the Move

episodes.synopsis: The fairies reconcile their differences with King as Ban leaves the forest. Meanwhile, Meliodas and gang are overwhelmed by the sheer power of Galand.
episodes.title: Overwhelming Violence

episodes.synopsis: Hendrickson, thought to have been defeated in a battle against Meliodas, aids Gilthunder and the Holy Knights against a powerful Gray Demon.
episodes.title: The Chief Holy Knight Atones For His Sins

episodes.synopsis: An injured Diane awakens, having trouble remembering her comrades. With her memories fading, she heads for Megadoza, home of the Giant Clan.
episodes.title: Where Memories Lead

episodes.synopsis: Meliodas and others head to Megadozer in hopes of finding Diane. Meanwhile, a confused Diane encounters Galand of the Ten Commandments once again.
episodes.title: The Druids' Holy Land

episodes.synopsis: Acknowledging his lack of strength to face the Ten Commandments, Meliodas vigorously trains with the Druids of Istar to regain his sealed powers back.
episodes.title: A Promise To A Loved One

episodes.synopsis: Ban reflects on his past after returning to his childhood home in Ravens. Meliodas's allies train for their inevitable war with the Ten Commandments.
episodes.title: What We Lacked

episodes.synopsis: A frail Zhivago reunites with Ban, his long-lost adopted son. Meanwhile, a wary King confronts Meliodas about his true intentions.
episodes.title: Father & Son

episodes.synopsis: After a brief encounter with Meliodas, the Ten Commandments begin their attack on Britannia. A resurrected Elaine appears before Ban.
episodes.title: Where Love Is Found

episodes.synopsis: A revived but possessed Elaine attacks her lover, Ban, as Melascula and Galand of the Ten Commandments emerge to destroy those in their path.
episodes.title: Farewell, Beloved Thief

episodes.synopsis: Jericho carries severely injured Ban and Elaine on her back while escaping from Galand and Melascula before stumbling into a bar deep inside a cave.
episodes.title: Master of the Sun

episodes.synopsis: Gloxinia and Drole of the Ten Commandments lure strong fighters to Vaizel by offering to grant any wish to the winner of their Great Fight Festival.
episodes.title: A Bloodcurdling Confession

episodes.synopsis: An elaborate trap-laden deadly maze constructed by Drole begins to  weed out the weaker challengers that have gathered for the Great Fight Festival.
episodes.title: Death-Trap Maze

episodes.synopsis: The surviving challengers of the Great Fight Festival are split into pairs and made to face each other in a tag team battle.
episodes.title: Legendary Figures

episodes.synopsis: King and Diane continue their battle against opponents summoned by Gloxinia and Drole. Escanor refuses to fight against his fellow ally Gowther.
episodes.title: For Whom Does That Light Shine?

episodes.synopsis: As Escanor's battle with Gowther comes to a dramatic end, Meliodas must now face the remaining Ten Commandments in an all-out battle.
episodes.title: Meliodas vs.The Ten Commandments

episodes.synopsis: With Meliodas rendered powerless, Ban asks to be transported back so he can aid him in his fight against Estarossa and the other Ten Commandments.
episodes.title: Have Hope

episodes.synopsis: While caring for Meliodas, Elizabeth encounters a former Great Holy Knight thought to have perished long ago by the hands of Dreyfus and Hendrickson.
episodes.title: Certain Warmth

episodes.synopsis: With Ban and the Holy Knights paralyzed by Estarossa’s powers, Escanor shows up to thwart the fall of Liones at the hands of the Ten Commandments.
episodes.title: Return of the Sins

episodes.synopsis: As the situation inside Liones Castle becomes even more dire, Merlin, freed from Galand's Commandment of Truth, reappears in her former form.
episodes.title: The Hero Rises!!

episodes.synopsis: Determined to kill his former leader for betraying their clan 3,000 years ago, Fraudrin takes on a newly resurrected darker, more powerful Meliodas.
episodes.title: So Long As You're Here

episodes.synopsis: Meliodas and Ban intercept a caravan transporting prisoners to the Ten Commandments, but demons still threaten villages in other parts of Britannia.
episodes.title: The Light That Sweeps Away the Darkness

episodes.synopsis: King and Diane take refuge in the Fairy King's Forest to escape the Ten Commandments. But Gloxinia and Drole find them after a peaceful interlude.
episodes.title: Memories of the Holy War

episodes.synopsis: Looking like Gloxinia and Drole, King and Diane are transported back to Britannia 3,000 years ago. There they meet Meliodas, who's fighting for Stigma.
episodes.title: Let There Be Light

episodes.synopsis: Led by Ludociel, the Four Archangels overwhelm the Ten Commandments. With no other choice, Derieri and Monspeet resort to extreme measures.
episodes.title: The Ten Commandments vs. The Archangels

episodes.synopsis: Elizabeth attempts to save Derieri and Monspeet from their Indura transformation. Defying Ludociel, Sariel and Tarmiel go to her aid.
episodes.title: Emotional Maelstrom

episodes.synopsis: The original Gowther comes to Diane and King with a request. King learns of a human revolt against Stigma and rushes to Gerheade's aid.
episodes.title: We Call That Love

episodes.synopsis: King regains consciousness in the present, but Diane is still stuck in the past facing Zeldris. Drole watches calmly, but King is frantic with worry.
episodes.title: Deadly Sins,Unite!!

episodes.synopsis: While King and the others search for him, the events that led Gowther to suppress his memories come to light. Then he meets Nadja.
episodes.title: The Doll Seeks Love

episodes.synopsis: Diane tells Elizabeth that she met someone who looked just like her in the past. Meliodas denies knowing anything about it when Elizabeth asks.
episodes.title: The Cursed Lovers

episodes.synopsis: On their way to liberate Camelot, Meliodas tells his comrades about the curse that two deities put upon him and Elizabeth 3,000 years ago.
episodes.title: The Life We Live

episodes.synopsis: The party heads to the city of Coland to dispel the distortion protecting Camelot. When Meliodas is trapped in darkness, they must fight without him.
episodes.title: The Hateful Cannot Rest

episodes.synopsis: Transformed into a giant snake, Melascula attacks Ban and the others. After Meliodas escapes the darkness, he unleashes his fearsome Assault Mode.
episodes.title: Love is a Maiden’s Power

episodes.synopsis: Meliodas regains the strength he had when he led the Ten Commandments. Escanor, whose power peaks at the stroke of noon, struggles against him.
episodes.title: The Almighty vs. the Greatest Evil

episodes.synopsis: The Demon King orders Zeldris to capture Meliodas and kill the Deadly Sins. But when he calls upon the Ten Commandments, no one answers.
episodes.title: A New Threat

episodes.synopsis: Chandler, Meliodas' former mentor, aids Zeldris. He infiltrates the Boar Hat to capture Meliodas, but the Deadly Sins stand in his way.
episodes.title: To Our Captain

episodes.synopsis: King prepares to face Chandler, who's returned in his demonic form. Gloxinia and Drole appear, risking their lives so the Deadly Sins can escape.
episodes.title: The Seven Deadly Sins End

episodes.synopsis: Meliodas disbands the Deadly Sins and departs with Elizabeth. But his companions aren't going to let him go without a fight, and Hawk holds the key.
episodes.title: Our Choices

episodes.synopsis: Merlin faces Zeldris, whom Meliodas has ordered to gather the Commandments. Margaret, Hendrickson and Dreyfus continue their search for Gilthunder.
episodes.title: March of the Saints

episodes.synopsis: Having taken over Margaret's body, Ludociel appears in Liones and declares a holy war against the Demon Clan. Chandler searches for Elizabeth.
episodes.title: The Holy War Pact

episodes.synopsis: In Camelot, Arthur searches for the Holy Sword Excalibur alone. Ludociel warns Escanor to give up his Grace of Sunshine, on pain of death.
episodes.title: Child of Hope

episodes.synopsis: Inside Camelot, Arthur makes his last stand against Meliodas and the others. Merlin comes to his rescue, but not before she falls under Cusack's spell.
episodes.title: Beginning of the Holy War

episodes.synopsis: The new Holy War commences as the allied forces of Stigma face off against the Demon Clan. Derieri decides to surrender her Commandment to Zeldris.
episodes.title: War-torn Britannia

episodes.synopsis: Sensing Elizabeth's magic, Derieri appears before the Stigma army. Estarossa follows her, but Sariel and Tarmiel have other plans for him.
episodes.title: The One Twisted by Darkness

episodes.synopsis: Estarossa professes his love for Elizabeth. When he loses control after absorbing three of the Commandments, Stigma's army faces him in a final battle.
episodes.title: Rampaging Love

episodes.synopsis: Ban searches purgatory for Meliodas. King, Deriri and the others head to Heaven's Theater to rescue Elizabeth, who's been abducted by Estarossa.
episodes.title: From Purgatory

episodes.synopsis: Reunited once again, Ban and Meliodas prepare to face the Demon King, who they suspect holds the key to their escape from purgatory.
episodes.title: A Meeting with the Unknown

episodes.synopsis: With Wild now an ally, Meliodas brings Zeldris' tragic past to light as the newly formed trio make their way towards the Demon King.
episodes.title: A Single-Minded Love

episodes.synopsis: Meliodas grapples with suddenly losing his memories of Estarossa. Zeldris, Chandler and Cusack threaten to overpower Merlin and the others.
episodes.title: The Victims of the Holy War

episodes.synopsis: Gowther reveals that his creator, the real Gowther, cast a forbidden spell on Mael and all those who knew him to end the Holy War 3,000 years ago.
episodes.title: The Tragic Strike

episodes.synopsis: Gowther takes on Mael to protect his friends. Diane also joins the battle, but the Archangel's power level continues to rise as he nears his final form.
episodes.title: Confront Despair!!

episodes.synopsis: Mael changes form after absorbing four of the Commandments. King soon overwhelms him with his Spirit Spear, but Gowther tries to save the Archangel.
episodes.title: Hope, Conflict, and Despair

episodes.synopsis: Meliodas and the others have to defeat the Demon King before they can escape purgatory and make their way to the world of the living.
episodes.title: The Doorway to Hope

episodes.synopsis: Chandler and Cusack merge to form the all-powerful Original Demon. Merlin gives up any hope of victory, but Mael and King soon come to her aid.
episodes.title: That Which Gathers

episodes.synopsis: As Meliodas absorbs every last one of the Ten Commandments, Merlin attempts a forbidden spell to stop the birth of the new Demon King.
episodes.title: The Salvation of the Sun

episodes.synopsis: Merlin's spell thwarts Meliodas' transformation. The Holy War seems to be over, but Elizabeth senses something is still terribly wrong.
episodes.title: The One Who Stands Against a God

episodes.synopsis: Escaping purgatory, Ban faces the Demon King, who now possesses Meliodas’ body. Elizabeth and the others make their way into the spirit world.
episodes.title: We'll All Be Your Strength

episodes.synopsis: Peace returns to the Kingdom of Liones. Although Elizabeth is still under a curse, Meliodas assures her there is a way to break it.
episodes.title: The End of a Long Journey

episodes.synopsis: Now that Meliodas is the Demon King, he cannot remain on earth. Though his friends acknowledge his fate, they are unable to accept it.
episodes.title: Farewell, Seven Deadly Sins

episodes.synopsis: Merlin rescues Elizabeth, who barely evades a falling boulder on her way to the Demon Realm with Meliodas. The Sins realize the Demon King is alive.
episodes.title: Fated Brothers

episodes.synopsis: Elizabeth and Meliodas face the Demon King, who now possesses the body of Zeldris. Meanwhile, the Sins clash with a beast summoned by the Demon King.
episodes.title: The Final Battle

episodes.synopsis: With Escanor's aid, Meliodas and Gowther reach the spirit world, where they aim to split the Demon King and Zeldris back into their own bodies.
episodes.title: The Voice Calling Your Name

episodes.synopsis: Diane destroys the source of the Demon King's magic. Meanwhile, Escanor continues fighting the Demon King at full power, exceeding his limits.
episodes.title: The King Sings Alone

episodes.synopsis: Escanor converts all of his life energy into magic to defeat the Demon King. Meliodas pleads with his comrade to stop, but Escanor refuses to listen.
episodes.title: The Struggle

episodes.synopsis: Zeldris and the Sins corner the Demon King in both realms, but the King separates from his son’s body and possesses Britannia itself as his new vessel.
episodes.title: Mortal Enemies

episodes.synopsis: The long-fought Holy War comes to a dramatic end. Peace returns to the Kingdom of Britannia once again, but a new threat looms on the horizon.
episodes.title: What the Witch Had Always Wanted

episodes.synopsis: The Sins are shocked by Merlin's longtime deception. Meanwhile, Merlin declares that Arthur has been recognized as the King of Chaos.
episodes.title: A Taste of Chaos

episodes.synopsis: A vicious beast in his true form, Cath attacks the reawakened Arthur. Now separated from the Sins, Merlin attempts to take on the monster herself.
episodes.title: An Everlasting Kingdom

episodes.synopsis: Arthur’s battle with Cath comes to an epic conclusion. The Seven Deadly Sins go their separate ways as peace returns to the world once again.
episodes.title: Heirs
